item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, August 30, 2024 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:

9. Rubi: Symbolic integrator based on an extensive system of integration rules (23 points | 10 comments)
10. Thousands of papers misidentify microscopes, in possible sign of misconduct (25 points | 9 comments)

12. Pie doesn't need to be original (unless you claim it so) (31 points | 34 comments)
13. Japan police: Nearly 4k who died alone at home not found for over a month (33 points | 32 comments)
14. Marketing to Engineers (136 points | 106 comments)

24. Can solar costs keep shrinking? (317 points | 494 comments)
25. Launch HN: CodeViz (YC S24) – Visual maps of your codebase in VS Code (158 points | 68 comments)
26. Show HN: bpfquery – experimenting with compiling SQL to bpf(trace) (27 points | 6 comments)
27. Predicting the future of distributed systems (51 points | 9 comments)
28. Firewall rules: not as secure as you think (133 points | 55 comments)
29. I'm blocking connections from AWS to my on-prem services (152 points | 99 comments)
30. Raspberry Pi Pico does line rate 100M Ethernet (216 points | 53 comments)
